headline: T. ROWE PRICE STUDY REVEALS NEARLY HALF OF CANADIANS ARE SAVING ALL THEY CAN TOWARD RETIREMENT, DESPITE MIXED ECONOMIC EXPECTATIONS AND INFLATION CONCERNS
summary: T. Rowe Price, a global asset management firm and a leader in retirement, today announced the Canadian-specific findings from its first-ever Global Retirement Savers Study. The survey results revealed that nearly half of Canadian retirement savers (48%) are contributing as much as they can afford to their workplace retirement plans, though only 41% believe their contributions—together with their employer match—will be enough to ensure a comfortable retirement.
